Package de.weltraumschaf.dht.msg

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Message<B>
    Represents a message send over the network.
    MessageBox
    This type defines a post box like container for messages.
    MessageSender
    Senders can send messages over the network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMessage<B>  
    DefaultMessageBox
    Implements a default message box to hold some messages.
    DefaultMessageSender
    Synchronous socket based implementation.
    MessageSerializer
    (De-)Serialize messages.
    Messaging
    Factory to get messaging implementations.
    Messaging.ProcollMessages
    Factory to create protocol message with an unique id.
    ProtocollMessage<B>  
    ProtocollMessage.FindNodeMessage
    FIND_NODE message.
    ProtocollMessage.FindValueMessage
    FIND_VALUE message.
    ProtocollMessage.PingMessage
    PING message.
    ProtocollMessage.StoreMessage
    STORE message.
    RawMessage
    Immutable type of a raw message sent over the network.
    StreamIo  
    TextMessage
    Implements a message type which has a plain text body.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    The types of messages.
